Sentence: Meanwhile, Caesar's adopted son and appointed successor, Octavius, arrives in Rome and forms a three-person coalition with Antony and Lepidus
The two continue to prepare for battle with Antony and Octavius
Octavius and Antony march their army toward Brutus and Cassius

Antony tells Octavius where to attack, but Octavius says that he (Antony) will make his (Antony) own orders; he (Antony) is already asserting his (Antony) authority as the heir of Caesar and the next ruler of Rome
